entry.title: Graduation Research Presentation (2019)
entry.content:
Inoue Lab. Students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

  • UENO Yumaã€€
    • Card Recognition from Characters in Trading Card Game.
  • OZAWA Natsuki
    • Knitting Pattern Generator Using Generative Adversarial Network
  • SAGARA Toshinori
    • Validation of the Effectiveness of Deep Q-Network in Imperfect-Information Games
  • YOSHINAMI So
    • Picture Recognition for Trading Card Games
entry.summary: Inoue Lab. Students present Graduation Research about each following theme.

entry.title: Invited Talk@APSCIT in Sapporo
entry.content:
Yusuke attended Asia Pacific Society for Computing and Information Technology (APSCIT) as an invited speaker in Sapporo, Japan.

  • Yusuke INOUE, Adaptive frame-rate control for low energy visual object tracking system, Jul. 2019, Sapporo.
entry.summary: Yusuke attended Asia Pacific Society for Computing and Information Technology (APSCIT) as an invited speaker in Sapporo, Japan.
